sentences.sContent: I don't know somebody who are mammonism .
sentences.sContent_eng: I don't know somebody who are mammonism .
sentences.sCn: 我不理解那些拜金主义的人。

sentences.sContent: It is generally said that mammonism is the root cause.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is generally said that mammonism is the root cause.
sentences.sCn: 一般会说拜金主义是根本原因。
